title: oneshot timer fails in select! if timeout is large value or 0
body:
Error occured when updating ~3 days old master to the current one (needed change was try_recv returning IoError instead of Option)

Code sample:

```
use std::io::timer::Timer;

fn main() {
    let (snd, rcv) = channel();
    let mut timer = Timer::new().unwrap();
    let mut t1 = timer.oneshot(1000);
    let x = std::u64::MAX;
    for _ in range(1, 1000000) {
        snd.send(1);
        t1 = timer.oneshot(x);
        select! {
            () = t1.recv() => (),
            _ = rcv.recv() => ()
        }
    }
}
```
